heading: HR00339
0: RESOLUTION COMMENDING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE ON HIS STATED INTENTION TO PURSUE AN INDEPENDENT FOREIGN POLICY AND PURSUANT, TO THE SAME, URGING HIM TO (1) FORM AN INDEPENDENT COMMISSION OF SUBJECT MATTER EXPERTS TO INVESTIGATE AND MAKE PUBLIC THROUGH ACADEMIC PUBLICATIONS AND OTHER VENUES OF THE CRIMES COMMITTED AGAINST THE FILIPINO PEOPLE DURING THE PHILIPPINE-AMERICAN WAR AND OTHER CONFLICTS AND (2) TO ABROGATE THE PHILIPPINES' UNEQUAL TIES TO THE UNITED STATES THROUGH THE VISITING FORCES AGREEMENT (VFA) AND THE ENHANCED DEFENSE COOPERATION AGREEMENT (EDCA)
status: Pending with the Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS since 2016-09-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00339
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION COMMENDING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE ON HIS STATED INTENTION TO PURSUE AN INDEPENDENT FOREIGN POLICY AND PURSUANT, TO THE SAME, URGING HIM TO (1) FORM AN INDEPENDENT COMMISSION OF SUBJECT MATTER EXPERTS TO INVESTIGATE AND MAKE PUBLIC THROUGH ACADEMIC PUBLICATIONS AND OTHER VENUES OF THE CRIMES COMMITTED AGAINST THE FILIPINO PEOPLE DURING THE PHILIPPINE-AMERICAN WAR AND OTHER CONFLICTS AND (2) TO ABROGATE THE PHILIPPINES' UNEQUAL TIES TO THE UNITED STATES THROUGH THE VISITING FORCES AGREEMENT (VFA) AND THE ENHANCED DEFENSE COOPERATION AGREEMENT (EDCA)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROQUE, HARRY L.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-13
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS ON 2016-09-20
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY
